channel.title: Want help with your client? Read this!
channel.description:
This section is to be used for questions related to the official Moparscape client, which can be found [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.0.html]here[/url].
Any topic that isn't related to the Moparscape client will be removed immediately; you may also receive a warning. All punishments are handed out at the discretion of the moderator giving the punishment.
If you would like to ask questions about or receive help related to other clients then you may post those questions [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html]here[/url]. Please note that the clients released by regular users are not developed by the people running this site. We consider them 3rd party applications, and as such we offer no support for them in any official capacity. You are ultimately responsible for any potential damage to your system through the use of these 3rd party clients; we take no responsibility.
Please read the rules for the Client Help section before making your topic.
[hr]
When using this section to ask questions about the official Moparscape client, please use a clear and descriptive topic title. This makes it easy for people to understand what your thread is about, and those that are capable of answering such a question will be able to identify your topic and post a reply.
